MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas. This is causing an intermittent supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 12:30pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:42pm on 18th January 2021
